message: Dear Bob, I am excited to offer you our premium product, which is tailored to meet your specific needs and expectations. Given its exceptional quality and functionality, it's valued at $10,000 by you. Considering its worth and the benefits it can bring to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $9,500. This is an opportunity not to be missed, as it represents a significant savings compared to the market value. Please let me know if you have any questions or need further details about the product.
